response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that holds significant value to both of us. Given its unique features and unparalleled quality, I believe it would greatly benefit you and align perfectly with your needs and aspirations. I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $800,000. This offer is designed to provide you with substantial savings while ensuring you receive a high-quality item that meets or exceeds your expectations. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 800000}
